name: Crash Fraud
description:
A game made for Ludum Dare 49, which had the theme unstable. This game was created by: 

Ryan Ventus - Programming

Ben Campbell - Programming and Music

Linus Alstergren - Artist

Jerome Bussat - Artist

Anna Newcomb - Artist

Remove pieces from unstable buildings to knock over nearby structures! You earn points based on how fast you solve the puzzle, and if you don't hit other nearby buildings!
